summary: This document is an email chain discussing the submission of manifest.plist files extracted from encrypted iOS backups found on Jeffrey Epstein's iMac. The correspondents debate whether to submit all recovered files or just one for analysis, indicating ongoing forensic examination of Epstein's digital devices.

events.title: Forensic file submission discussion
events.description: Email correspondence regarding the submission of manifest.plist files from encrypted iOS backups found on Jeffrey Epstein's iMac for forensic analysis.

keyFacts: Forensic investigators recovered multiple manifest.plist files from encrypted iOS backups on Jeffrey Epstein's iMac.
The files were being submitted for analysis, with discussion about whether to submit all files or just one representative sample.
The document indicates ongoing digital forensic examination of Epstein's devices as part of the investigation.
The correspondence is dated September 16, 2019, after Epstein's death in August 2019.
The document is subject to a protective order restricting certain paragraphs from public disclosure.
